messagebundle.msg: Progressively add totals (1.. 2.. 3), or show individual values (1.. 1.. 1).
Days (including today) to show in the graph.
The projects to display information for.
Authentication required to use this gadget
Projects or categories to use as the basis for the graph.
Saved filter to use for the query.
Helps to distinguish between similar fields
If you are a registered user, there may be more information available to you. You will need to log in and approve this gadget''s access to your account. (Show Restricted URLs)
An internal server error occurred when requesting resource {1}.
Days must be greater or equal to zero.
Number of results to display (maximum of 50).
The length of periods represented on the graph.
There are problems with the current configuration for this gadget. The errors below may have been caused by the deletion of entities required by the gadget or by changes to your permissions.
Legacy portlet with key ''{0}'' could not be loaded
Number must be less than or equal to 50
Error rendering save to dashboard form.
You can not mix categories and projects.
Please login OR contact Administrator to configure Application Link
Please select a filter or project
Click here to select/change filter or project.
''All Projects'' can not be selected along with other projects
Indexing is currently not configured so no issue searching can be performed.
How often you would like this gadget to update
Project or saved filter to use as the basis for the graph.
Days must not exceed {0} for {1} period
Unfortunately, one or more of your preferences are now unavailable. Please update your preferences, or remove gadget by clicking delete from the title bar above.
''All Categories'' can not be selected along with other categories
This gadget requires a logged in user.
Please contact your administrator to get indexing configured.
Project to use as the basis for the graph.
The value must be an integer greater than 0 and less than or equal to 50
Your query can not start with ''*'' or ''?''
Select which type of statistic to display for this filter.
The selected filter {0} has an error: {1}.
The filter for this gadget did not return any issues
Display statistics of issues returned from specified filter
Whether to show totals for each of the columns and rows.
Sort by row total or natural field order.
